content: I want u to create modules for task managements and u can add your magic in it(i want to give me json file for that )

all actions must be included in all modules
clone action is missing 
please add it
static attribute must be available in all fields

Please adjust the following and rewrite the complete modules:
1. Add suggested icons for fields 
2.All fields *must* contain all attributes below
{
  "name": "permanentAddress",
  "lang": [
    {
      "name": "en",
      "label": "Full permanent address",
      "placeholder": "Full permanent address",
      "options": []
    },
    { 
      "name": "ar", 
      "label": "", 
      "placeholder": "", 
      "options": [] 
    }
  ],
  "vRequired": false,
  "template": "item",
  "type": "textarea",
  "list": false,
  "select": {
    "name": "name",
    "static": true,
    "dynamic": true,
    "table": ""
  },
  "regex": "",
  "preCode": "",
  "postCode": ""
}
